name: astrophysical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the science of astrophysics (= the study of stars and other objects in space using physical laws): She is a professor of astrophysical and planetary sciences. Much astrophysical research requires very large telescopes. Scientists at the institute study astrophysical phenomena such as solar flares and supernovae. See
astrophysics
More examplesFewer examplesThe formation of a black hole is fairly well understood in astrophysical terms. Astrophysical events that occur on a human timescale attract a lot of public attention.Space station crew conducted a series of Earth observation and astrophysical experiments. The team’s research was accepted for publication by a prestigious astrophysical journal.
